Name: Nelson's Blood No.2
Ingredients: 12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: The pungent flavours of naval rum contribute to this tasty, fruity rum punch and will warm your cockles – m' hearties!
History: A cocktail promoted by the marketers of Pusser's Rum.
Nutrition: One serving of Nelson's Blood No.2 contains 211 calories
